BUY_CARD - it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.CommandName
this command represent the buy card command
buyCard(int, CardColor, int, CollectionResources) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
this method buy a card paying its cost and locate it in the dashboard, in particular, it get and remove the card selected by the level and the color from the market, it place the card in the dashboard at the position selected, it infer the resources to pay from the strongbox as the resources to pay from warehouse given in input minus the cost (eventually discounted) of the card, and pay the resources from the warehouse and the dashboard NB: it requires that the inputs are all correct
buyCard(int, CardColor, int, CollectionResources) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.SingleGame.SingleGame
like in the superclass but at the end it calls checkEndGame to end the game immediately if it needs to be ended
buyCard(BufferedReader) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CliCommandCreator
this method handle the buy card command creation

buyDevelopmentCard(CollectionResources, CollectionResources) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.RealPlayer
this method buy the a development card removing resources from the dashboard in particular, it removes the resources in the input from the strongbox and from warehouse if the player has a discount of resources, the resources are already discounted by the game
